name: Brewplus-ifdb
body:
### Welcome to BrewPlus IFDB Etition Pages.

Inserire qui una descrizione del programma

### Creating pages manually
If you prefer to not use the automatic generator, push a branch named `gh-pages` to your repository to create a page manually. In addition to supporting regular HTML content, GitHub Pages support Jekyll, a simple, blog aware static site generator. Jekyll makes it easy to create site-wide headers and footers without having to copy them across every page. It also offers intelligent blog support and other advanced templating features.

### Authors and Contributors

Contributors: 

Alessandro "@aperuzzi" Peruzzi, Angelo "Girella" Cerella, Michele "@rekhyt75" Antonecchia 

For Italian translation of BJCP, Malt list and Hop list: 

Giovanni "@mr-sgabuzen" Iovane, Luciano "BATIGOLLE" Picchioni, Massimo "superpiggy" Scalvini, Vito "@vitofasano" Fasano  

Special thanks to: 

Antonio De Feo, Stefano Longo

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out our [documentation](https://help.github.com/pages) or [contact support](https://github.com/contact) and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
